snippet: It's a bad idea to show up at the admission office to "plead your case." The author, a director of college counseling, provides some proactive steps that deferred students can take.
abstract: It's a bad idea to show up at the admission office to "plead your case." The author, a director of college counseling, provides some proactive steps that deferred students can take.

headline.main: What to Do if You Are Deferred to the Regular Decision Pool
